oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Negro Lawmaker Campaigns for Mayor's Post In Memphis"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: civil rights; Willis, A. W., Jr.; Jet Magazine; elections; politics;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A 10-page article describing Willis and his mayoral campaign in Memphis. A campaign sticker on the front cover urges readers to share the magazine copy with a friend.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Reid, Leahmon L.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by Sally Lineback
